title: Pyramid Scheme

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who are visited  by a player part of your pyramid scheme are forced to join the pyramid scheme one tier down.

> Second tier: Given roleblock immunity
> Third tier: Nothing
> Fourth tier: Cannot use ability twice in a row
> Fifth tier: Given vulnerable defence
> Sixth+ tier: Will be dealt an unstoppable attack at the end of the following night
